title: Driveflow: Driving School Management System
description: A web-based management system for driving schools with student enrollment and instructor scheduling features. Developed as my Final Year Project.

detailedInfo.websiteOverview: Driveflow is a comprehensive web-based management system designed specifically for driving schools to streamline their daily operations and enhance administrative efficiency.
detailedInfo.websitePurpose: To digitize and automate driving school operations, reducing manual paperwork and providing a centralized platform for managing students, instructors, schedules, and progress tracking.
detailedInfo.targetAudience: Driving school administrators, instructors, and students who need an efficient system to manage enrollment, scheduling, and academic progress in a digital environment.
